result.execSummary:
The defendant Tyrone L Nicholson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Tyrone L Nicholson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Tyrone L Nicholson was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Court withheld sentence but granted defendant 40 days time-served in the event that sentence is imposed at a later date.

REFERRAL TO MENTAL HEALTH UNIT OF PROBATION.

miscConds.notes:
Pay all mandatory cost, fees and DV surcharges during Probation. 
 Failure to pay is civil judgment.
NO VIOLENT CONTACT with Koyuma N.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyrone L Nicholson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Tyrone L Nicholson in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Defendant Tyrone L Nicholson in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller  with student,  appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

AS TO COUNT ONE: 

Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.

ON MOTION OF THE STATE, COURT ORDERED COUNT TWO:  DISMISSED.  Court withheld sentence, but granted defendant credit for 40 DAYS time served in the event that sentence is imposed at a later date.  Court placed defendant on probation for ONE YEAR with the following conditions:
*REFERRAL TO MENTAL HEALTH UNIT OF PROBATION
*TAKE ALL PRESCRIBED MEDICATIONS
*PAY ALL MANDATORY COSTS, FEES AND DOMESTIC SURCHARGES DURING PROBATION OR CIVIL JUDGMENT TO BE ENTERED AGAINST THE DEFENDANT
*NO VIOLENT CONTACT WITH KOYUMA N.
*AODA/ANY TREATMENT DEEMED APPROPRIATE 

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Tyrone L Nicholson in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 04-07-2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Richard E. Thomey in court, defendant Tyrone L Nicholson not in court, in custody.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 04-06-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Koyuma N.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Tyrone L Nicholson in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  
Defendant Tyrone L Nicholson in custody.  
Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  
Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
